summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Italian real estate investment app after Portfolio page removal and investment score logic updates. All major functionality working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Portfolio route /portfolio shows blank page instead of proper 404 error page
design_issues.note: Route is properly removed from React Router but shows blank page instead of user-friendly 404

passed_tests: Seed sample data endpoint /api/seed-sample-data returns 404 (correctly removed)
Investment score penalty logic working (score 2/10 for negative metrics)
Landing page shows correct hero image URL
Landing page button says 'Vedi Piani' (not 'Vedi Portfolio')
Analyze page loads and form works correctly
Complete analysis flow: property input → financing → results with score
Results page displays investment score and metrics correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor UI improvement needed for portfolio route 404 page)
